short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will change the header color of Umbraco depending on the enviroment that you have open to try make it clear

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow Developers and marketing employees tell what environment they have open.

The extension reads the url that is open to work out what environment is open and will change the background colour of the header in umbraco so people can clearly tell the difference.

each environment will have a set colour

Light Blue = Dev
Red = Stage
Green = Prod

This is made for victorian plumbing employees to use,
